item.title: purpleteam
item.description:
Automated security regression testing of your web applications and APIs, no setup required.

1. Write test conditions -> convert to Cucumber
2. Provide minimal configuration
3. Consume node CLI package
4. Run single command purpleteam test
Perfect for your CI/nightly build

item.title: Talk - Moving to test and behaviour-driven development
item.description: At Canterbury Software Cluster: In this session Kim went over the benefits of introducing TDD and BDD: How to introduce them, their differences, how to deal with push back from team members and upper management.
